Title: Requires municipalities to maintain sidewalks abutting streets; repealer
Summary: Requires municipalities to maintain sidewalks abutting streets.
LawCode: Amd §130, Town L; amd §92, Sec Cl Cit L; rpld §§16-123 & 19-152, NYC Ad Cd; add §96-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, the second class cities law, and the general municipal law, in relation to the maintenance of sidewalks; and to repeal sections 16-123 and 19-152 of the administrative code of the city of New York relating thereto
